description:
Posted @withregram • @holistic.nomad Viruses are not living things so they can't be infectious. The only way people can get it is through injection. And that's why people die from the flu shot, not because of the flu. The same way that during the Spanish flu in 1918, people were vaccinated and the vaccines set off symptoms.  And most people died because they were advised to take aspirin which is immune suppressant and led to pneumonia. The combination led to millions of deaths. But there was no virus. Their disease was electrical disease as a result of the increase in the electromagnetic fields in the atmosphere.
